title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers; interact with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and retrievers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); supports multi-model chats, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream or block on chat, pull, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers with one command.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Community n8n node that adds Ollama chat, embed, and model operations to workflows.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama models on demand.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for private Q&A.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice wrapper that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models.
